text: @MarshaBlackburn Oh my God! You don't want patients of #COVID19 to sue Trump or Kushner or others for USA's massive failures. I'm an Alabamian & a once proud Republican. Now I don't even recognize the party of blame, money & power hungry, constitution hating fools. You've sold out this country.
